short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fun magical elemental golem pet in your browser!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A fun magical elemental golem pet that sits... and scratches!
GolemSax is a virtual pet extension featuring a fictional elemental golem. Current functions include soothing graphics and interactions serving to relieve stress during work. 
Future functions include a more diverse choice on personal designs for your virtual golem. 
We aim to construct a community revolving this virtual golem to enhance the work experience of anyone enjoying the accompany of a virtual being.
